title: Ucy
author: Ucy
content: The issue is with Egypt and it's connected to GERD and river Nile. I have noticed how Egypt is trying to ally with people who could help her agenda in stopping the GERD project in Ethiopia and it seems one of the countries she choose is Sudan.It's either you (Sudan) stop any evil alliance you're currently having with Egypt that is link to the GERD especially or you allow those oppose to such alliance to rule.
